extends Object
implements SubscriptionServiceMockCacheInterface
    Implementation of the SubscriptionServiceMockCacheInterface.

      Returns the subscription with the given id.

      This method propagates the enabling/disabling of an account's payment method through the subscription's payment methods.

      Removes the given account from the cache.

        Returns:

        Returns:
